At the heat of battle, although badly injured and losing battery fluid at a=
n alarmingly fast rate, Tucson was not about to give up and fall over just =
like that. With a gripped fist, and one good missile carrier working, he na=
rrows his optics further, and aims toward Hydras, attempting a very complex=
 but close range shot to his chest. And now, since lack of energy envelopes=
 him, he again loses his vision.  

" If you think what you've done to me, =
is going to stop me from winning back the freedom of innocent beings and my=
 comrades, you're sadly mistaken Hydras!  IT'S TIME TO PAY OFF YOUR DEBT!"
=

He fires, not knowing where that shot will go.  It was clear his temper wa=
s at a breaking point and he was not about to take scrap from anyone.   As =
the shot rings out, the recoil of that weapon causes him to stumble, yet no=
w, weakness has eveloped him further, as he loses his footing, and crashes =
to the ground, on his left side.

Night Shift and Straight Shot scramble as=
 they dodge firepower and quickly try to reach Tucson Prime.  Straight Shot=
's eyes, wide with fear, and shock.

"NOOO!  Tucson!  OHH PRIMUS NOOO!"

Sh=
e's quick to get to his side as is Night Shift.

"TUCSON, TALK TA ME! C'MON=
, YOU'RE SO NOT DO'N THIS TA US! YA CAN'T!  C'MON, SNAP OUT OF IT MAN!"

Ni=
ght Shift opens a com link to Noctorro.

"NIGHT SHIFT TA NOCTORRO!  OVER, W=
E GOT AN EMERGENCY!  TUCSON'S DOWN, I REPEAT TUCSON'S DOWN!"

Straight Shot=
 looks over to Kup.

"KUP, HELP US!  WE GOTTA MOVE TUCSON TA COVER!"

Then,=
 a groan from Tucson as he somewhat gains concsciousness.

" It's - It's al=
l right, I - I can do this."

Straight Shot stops him from trying to get up=
.

"No, Tucson, you can't!  You're losing battery fluid and you hardly have=
 enough energy to keep awake!  Night Shift is trying to get a hold of Nocto=
rro, and we're gonna get ya somewhere safe from harm.  We can't risk it, Tu=
cson, we need you alive! Ughh, why the scrap do ya have ta be so stubborn?!=
  You've always been like this!  When you put your mind ta something you do=
n't stop until you get it done!  Well, this time, I'm NOT letting you!"

Tu=
cson couldn't help but listen to her.

"All right, you - wouldn't have yell=
ed at me if you didn't care.  I understand."

She sighs.

"Finally, some se=
nse actually gets through that directory of yours. Now, hold still, you'll =
lose more battery fluid if ya try ta move."

Inside the Black Tower, Rat Tr=
ap gets the message, as he gets up, and scrambles for his life, as he quick=
ly backtracks the way he got in. 

"I hear ya Rodimus!  Ohhhh, time ta haul=
 tail!  Hey, by the way, I can't get through ta Wheels!  I think somethn's =
really wrong with 'em, because he usually responds right away ta me!"

Outs=
ide the Ark, Uproar and Quickstride continue to stick close to Rodimus and =
the others and nodd as they look to each other.  Uproar grins.

"Cool, so i=
f the fortress goes bye bye, then we regain the control of the Ark... Maybe=
 it's better if we wait it out a little bit."

Quickstride grins too.

"Yea=
h, true, if we wait it out, then we got a better chance at getting in safel=
y, and effectively.. I like that idea. I'd rather not have ta damage anythi=
ng in the Ark... "
